tool_description: An API that provides stock-market Indexes from America, Asia-Pacific, Europe, East-Asia, Middle-East and Africa.
name: Google Finance Worldwide Indexes
title: Google Finance Worldwide Indexes

api_list.name: Get  all Indexes from America (South,Middle,North)
api_list.description: This endpoint gets you all Indexes from America (South,Middle,North) as an array of objects with key-value pairs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-finance-worldwide-indexes.p.rapidapi.com/indexAmerica"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-finance-worldwide-indexes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Usage Information
api_list.description: This endpoint shows the other endpoints to get a certain index.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-finance-worldwide-indexes.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-finance-worldwide-indexes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
